p: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), first described in humans in December 2019 in Wuhan, China ( 1), is the third coronavirus to have emerged in the last 20 years. Previous outbreaks of the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV) in 2002 and the Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) in 2012 have been toppled in case incidence by the global impact of SARS-CoV-2 ( 2).
